mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, title, content, writer, reg_date as regDate from board where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer} where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, title, content, writer, reg_date as regDate from board where board_no > 0 order by board_no desc, reg_date desc
